title: Water Lotus
description: Vegetarian fast food restaurant serving complete meals including main dish (a number of mock meats), rice, soup, and veggies. Has vegan options. Convenient to Xinanmingzu University and Wuhou Temple (with nearby Buddhist shopping area). Shuhan Street is 0.5km west of the Wuhou Temple entrance on Wuhouci Street. Turn left on Shuhan Street and follow 0.25km until Shuhan intersects with Shuhan East Street. Name in Chinese: 清水荷花食坊(武侯祠店). Address in Chinese: 武侯区蜀汉街10号附11号(近武侯区政府).
